alert.note: Alert for Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 8:53PM EST until January 12 at 11:18AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Maryland... Potomac River at Edwards Ferry affecting Northwest Montgomery, Eastern Loudoun and Western Loudoun zones. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Potomac River at Edwards Ferry. * WHEN...From this evening to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.7 feet, The Chisel Branch Hiker/Biker Campsite near the C&O Canal trail starts flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:31 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.0 feet, or 8.1 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Please visit weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Wed Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 1AM 7AM 1PM Stg Time Date Potomac River Edwards Ferr 15.0 7.0 Tue 8 pm 7.8 8.6 10.5 13.9 7pm Thu &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/washington or weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 500 AM EST.
